TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebScriptEnablingBehavior extends System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class WebScriptEnablingBehavior Inherits WebHttpBehavior

summary.span: 为启用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 终结点的行为提供支持，以便接收来自基于浏览器的 ASP.NET AJAX 客户端的 HTTP 请求。

span.span: Provides support for the behavior that enables Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用于终结点时， 行为会启用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 和 ASP.NET AJAX 集成，但 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编码所需的支持除外。When applied to an endpoint, the behavior enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding. 各种类型的编码（包括 JSON）由 启用，或者由进行了适当配置的 启用。Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the or by an appropriately configured . 行为可实现 并继承自 ，该行为可为公开非 SOAP 终结点的 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务启用更常规的 Web 编程模型。The behavior implements the and inherits from , which enables the more general Web programming model for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services exposing non-SOAP endpoints. 具体来说，：Specifically, the : - 启用 HTTP 编程模型，包括调度基于 URL 后缀的操作、支持 HTTP 谓词选择（POST 或 GET）以及 HTTP 缓存持续时间控制。Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] HTTP 编程模型，请参阅[WCF Web HTTP 编程模型概述](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model-overview.md)。 the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-programming-model-overview.md). 请注意，在使用此行为时，默认的 HTTP 谓词为 POST。Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior. - 为每个操作的请求和响应消息启用正确的格式化程序，例如，对 URL 参数的支持。Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters. - 启用 JavaScript 代理终结点。Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint. 若要从 ASP.NET AJAX 客户端调用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务，必须使用 绑定来配置服务，而且必须将 添加到终结点行为集合中。To call a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the binding and the must be added to the endpoint behavior collection. 这可以是在配置中通过添加或而不通过激活 AJAX 终结点与使用配置而不是中的默认工厂[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) .svc 指令文件。This can be done either in configuration by adding the or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive in the .svc file. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 若要启用的不同方式[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]服务以响应 ASP.NET AJAX 客户端，请参阅[为 ASP.NET AJAX 创建 WCF 服务](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md)。 different ways to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md).

summary.span: 将行为应用于终结点上的客户端。

span.span: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法，以查看或修改自定义扩展，或者将自定义扩展添加到与某个终结点一起使用的或针对特定操作的所有消息的客户端运行时。Implements the method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，将行为应用于某终结点时 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会自动调用此方法。Normally, this method is called by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint. 因此，不需要手动调用此方法。So there is no need to call this method manually.

span.span: The that exposes the contract.

summary.span: 确认该终结点满足使它能够用作 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点的要求。

span.span: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证该终结点不为 `null`、使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 方案、不使用 、使用 HTTP GET 或 POST 谓词，验证是否将绑定的 设置为 ，并验证该绑定是否包含一个 ，其中 设置为 `true`。Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the , uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the of the binding is set to , and that the binding contains a where is set to `true`. 此方法还检查这些方法或操作的其他不受支持的方面是否不存在 SOAP 标头或包装名称。This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.

exception.span: 该终结点不符合作为 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点的需求之一。

span.span: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
